item.title: Legal
item.description: I do not collect any personal data unless you choose to share it with me. I do however use Google Analytics to gather anonymous statistics about this website. You can opt out for this service here. This website was made using: Hugo and a modified version of this theme.

item.title: Pricing
item.description: Cloud hosting We offer one package for all purposes. If you need something else, please contact us. PHP Shared hosting Storage 25GB SSD Bandwidth Unlimited (FUP) Domains Link up to 1 main domain Subdomains Unlimited Domain aliases Unlimited Databases 50x MySQL Mailboxes 5x POP3/IMAP Outgoing mail PHP mail() or SMTP PHP Latest 7.
